Html:
I have written a GMap.NET map provider for New Zealand topomaps web service provided by the New Zealand government department LINZ.
It is essentially a very small mod of the class MapBenderWMSProvider, with a changed URL to target the LINZ web services.
To use it you will need to create a LINZ api key at http://data.linz.govt.nz/my/api/

The only thing that really changes (apart from the GUID) from MapBenderWMSProvider is (obivously) the UrlFormat:
  static readonly string UrlFormat = "http://wms.data.linz.govt.nz/{api key}/r/wms?service=WMS&VERSION=1.1.1&REQUEST=GetMap&SERVICE=WMS&LAYERS=x767&styles=&bbox={0},{1},{2},{3}&width={4}&height={5}&srs=EPSG:4326&format=image/png";
Replace {api key} with the API key generated from the LINZ site.
